text: Thanks <@U6W3H6YN8> thinking even if you just had the ability to host one video or a video with a limit on the duration of 30 seconds or something just to enable you to build fully in sandbox

<@U0177RKAS1H> I was considering something similar for Memberships.  The reason it's not in free portals is because it has the potential for email sending and spam.  Would you say that 3-5 email sends would be reasonable for that in free?
